summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad Renewing Eye Cream is a multi-active, anti-aging treatment for the eye area that helps firm, brighten & hydrate to minimize the signs of aging.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltra-nourishing eye cream firms, brightens and targets signs of agingVisibly minimizes lines & wrinkles; increases elasticityReduces the appearance of dark circles & puffinessSafe for sensitive skinAlways tested on people, never on animalsKey IngredientsAdvanced peptides and retinol visibly minimize lines and wrinklesMango butter increases elasticityEye Brightening Complex reduces the appearance of dark circles and under-eye puffiness for brighter, younger-looking eyesFormulated WithoutParabens, sulfates, and phthalatesItem 2099915How To UseGently pat a small amount onto the brow bone and beneath the eye.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Tricaprylyl Citrate, Pentylene Glycol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Jojoba Esters, Glycerin, Boron Nitride, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Dimethicone, Cetyl Phosphate, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Serenoa Serrulata Fruit Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Dipeptide-2, Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium PCA, Panthenol, Oleyl Alcohol, Steareth-20, Lecithin, Carbomer, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium EDTA, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently pat a small amount onto the brow bone and beneath the eye.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.
